title: Assignment weightage
content: So  my teacher said that an open book test would be taken as an assignment. Foolish me thought it would be easy and didn't take it seriously. But I performed really bad in the test ( 4/11 qs only attempted).So wanted to know if this bad performance will affect my cgpa a lot

comments.body: Mechanics? I don't think it really matters I've already had it a week ago

**Everything** contributes to your CGPA by some weightage. Which is why it's imperative to perform well in everything here to get a 9+. 

Either way, you can find out how much it affects by simply scaling the assignment marks to their contribution out of 100%. Usually it's 10%, could be lesser.
